data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Grid} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Grid.Container
    class="grid-preview"
    points={["6", "mobile:3", "tablet:4", "desktop:5"]}
    spacing="medium"
>
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />

    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />
</Grid.Container>

<style>
    :global(.grid-preview .box) {
        height: 3rem;
    }
</style>
data.title: Grid Preview
